pkgmetadata.longdescription:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/setupcfg.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/setupcfg/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ [sudo] pip install setupcfg```#### Related+ [`classifiers-generator` - classifiers generator](https://pypi.org/project/readme-docstring/)+ [`readme-badges` - `README.md` badges](https://pypi.org/project/readme-badges/)+ [`readme-docstring` - generate README.md from python docstrings](https://pypi.org/project/readme-docstring/)+ [`readme-generator` - `README.md` generator](https://pypi.org/project/readme-generator/)+ [`setupcfg-generator` - `setup.cfg` generator](https://pypi.org/project/setupcfg-generator/)+ [`travis-generator` - `.travis.yml` generator](https://pypi.org/project/travis-generator/)#### Links+ [metadata, options - setuptools documentation](http://setuptools.readthedocs.io/en/latest/setuptools.html#metadata)+ [Specifying values](http://setuptools.readthedocs.io/en/latest/setuptools.html#specifying-values)
